title: Have there been any new studies of erosion in the Shell Island Resort/Mason Inlet area recently? Several years back there was extensive work done at rebuilding what mother nature took from the inlet. It would be interesting to know if mother nature once again is retaking what is hers and if it has been substantially measured through any survey studies.
